title.narrative: Joint UNIDO-UNEP Programme on Resource Efficient and Cleaner Production (RECP) in Developing and Transition Countries

description.narrative: The Programme objective is to improve resource productivity and environmental performance of businesses and other organisations and thereby contribute to sustainable industrial development and sustainable consumption and production in the participating developing and transitional economies. The Programme will achieve greater uptake of RECP by businesses, governments, financial institutions and other stakeholders (the overarching outcome). Outcomes will be monitored in terms of number of businesses, government organisations and other relevant stakeholders that have adopted RECP concepts, methods, techniques and/or policies. Impact at the level of businesses and other organisations will be evident from reduction of pollution and waste intensities (as measured in e.g. tons of waste per unit of productive output) and more efficient use of natural resources (as measured in e.g. water or energy use per unit of productive output). The programme will contribute to the realisation of the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs), primarily to MDG7 (ensuring environmental sustainability) and MDG 8 (developing a global partnership for development). MDG7 contributions are ensured through identification, implementation and dissemination of RECP practices and technologies, leading to reductions in the generation of waste and emis
